rows.label: qst104701_msg001
rows.name: なんの船だろう(仮)

rows.label: qst104701_msg0001
rows.name: Is something wrong, ma'am?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0002
rows.name: I beg your pardon?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, forgive me.
My name is Byakko.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0004
rows.name:
You looked somewhat troubled, so
I couldn't help but inquire.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0005
rows.name:
Is that so? Well, I don't know why
I'm surprised. We beasts are always
more in tune than humans are.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0006
rows.name: My name is Enju.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0007
rows.name:
These ships are bound for Torigo
in Gula Province.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0008
rows.name:
They carry people who see no good
future for Superbia and seek to
escape the capital.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0009
rows.name:
These are uncertain times...
So it goes.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0010
rows.name:
My Driver, Oswalt, is a Gulan who
has been chosen to act as an
intermediary for the refugees.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0011
rows.name:
We came to the capital after he
was scouted by an imperial recruiter
and awoke me from my Core.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0012
rows.name:
But Oswalt has a gentle soul, not meant
for war. He won't even complain to the
shopkeeper when an apple is moldy.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0013
rows.name:
I do wonder if he will be able to
effectively bring together the
Superbians and Gulan.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0014
rows.name:
If he's as kind as you say, then
I'd say there is no problem.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0015
rows.name: My Driver is also from Gula.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0016
rows.name:
We travel with an Superbian
but the two of them get along
just fine.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0017
rows.name:
That's wonderful! I hope we can do as
good a job of fostering cooperation
between the two peoples!

rows.label: qst104701_msg0018
rows.name:
Everyone, I must confess I am a little
worried for her... Well, for the people
on the boat as well.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0019
rows.name:
Would you mind if we
made sure they were all right?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0020
rows.name: You have my thanks.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0021
rows.name:
Are you quite sure?
How marvelously generous!

rows.label: qst104701_msg0022
rows.name:
The boat should be leaving
any moment now.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0023
rows.name:
We shall be docking at the Torigo
Relay Base in Gula Province.
Can I ask you to meet us there?

rows.label: qst104701_msg0024
rows.name:
Sounds good, ma'am.
We shall see you there.

rows.label: qst104701_msg0025
rows.name: Until then!
